name: High Stakes (Hamdaan Khan)
description:
A high action, high speed, two player car game. 

A split screen car game in which you have to avoid the traffic and reach till the finish line.  Earn powerups along the way to help you to ease your way to victory. 

Stay tuned for more maps, customizability and more in future updates.

Don't forget to leave your feedback and comment ideas for future games in the comments below.

 Race against your friend to see who can claim the ultimate victory!

Inspired from the popular mobile game Traffic Racer.
